author: radim.pavlicek@laurinka.com
data:
Place tees 3 inches on each side of the cup. You need 3 balls.

The drill

Putt 1 ball left to the hole, between the tee and cup, putt 1 ball right of the hole and the third one into the hole. All of them must not touch edges of the hole. Repeat 3 consecutive times and move back to the 6 feet.
